title: Christmas skin summoner icon missing?
body:
The holiday icon I earned from 2014 during the Poro King days isn't in my icon list...it was there a few days ago. Is this happening to anyone else?

{{summoner:30}} {{summoner:31}}

replies.body:
Hey Leio Shiunsai,

Are you referring to this guy?

He's still in my Summoner Icon inventory. If you believe you earned him during the event, but are no longer seeing him, please submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) so we can take a look at your account and see what's going on.
You...you have come to my rescue. I simply cannot play Slay Belle Kat without this icon. However may I thank thee?
A simple thank you will do just fine. ^-^

Thank you <3 

{{champion:103}} realized there was no charm icon...so I just went with Ahri instead.
